main event: Multiple observations of unidentified flying objects were reported in Dayton, Ohio, on various dates in 1944 and 1948.
interesting points: Witnesses reported bright lights in the sky, one described a bright red streak of light,There was no sound associated with the sightings,Some reports suggested the object might have been a weather balloon,Multiple incidents occurred in close temporal proximity,Observations lasted only a few seconds but seemed distinctive enough to warrant investigation.
sighted object: a bright red streak of light and luminous pulses of light
witness description: A driver and a passenger, both have aviation backgrounds.
